```{r}
library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)
library(plotly)

ui <- dashboardPage(
  dashboardHeader(title = "The Influence of Social Vulnerability on Covid-19", 
                  titleWidth = 500),
  dashboardSidebar(width = 200),
  dashboardBody(
    fluidRow(
      box(selectInput('plot_typ', "Choose a plot:",
                  choices = c('Vaccinations', 'Cases'),
                  ),
      plotlyOutput("plot"))
    )
   )
)



server <- function(input, output) { 
  
  
  output$plot <- renderPlotly({
    
      if(input$plot_typ == 'Vaccinations'){
        y <- vax_cases_svi$vacs_100k
      } else if(input$plot_typ == 'Cases'){
        y <- vax_cases_svi$sum_cases_p100k
      }
    
    
    ggplotly(
      ggplot(vax_cases_svi, aes(x = rems, y = y)) +
        geom_point() +
      xlab('Racial and Ethnic Minority Status Percentile') +
      ylab('Sum of Vax/100k')+
      labs(color = "Household Characteristics Vulnerability") + 
      scale_color_manual(limits = c(TRUE, FALSE),
                     values = c("#FFCC00","#336600"), 
                     labels = c('Above 50th Percentile', "Below 50th Percentile")) +
      theme_gray()
    )
  })
    
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
